post.title: AI Steady at 45 Percent Vulnerable
post.excerpt: Chris Wysopal shows that while amount of functioning code is way up the number of vulnerabilities per line is the same. So that means more vulnerabilities can ship since the code can compile and run. Excellent. https://x.com/weldpond/status/1950533144341332341?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
post.content: Chris Wysopal shows that while amount of functioning code is way up the number of vulnerabilities per line is the same. So that means more vulnerabilities can ship since the code can compile and run. Excellent. https://x.com/weldpond/status/1950533144341332341?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
